headline: Will EPAM’s (EPAM) New $1 Billion Buyback Shape Its AI Investment Strategy?
summary: EPAM Systems' Board of Directors recently authorized a new stock repurchase program of up to US$1 billion, to be executed over a 24-month period. This move highlights management's confidence in EPAM's financial stability and its commitment to enhancing shareholder value while continuing investments in AI-driven growth initiatives. We'll now examine how this significant buyback program influences the investment narrative for EPAM, particularly around capital allocation and AI...

headline: EPAM Launches AI/Run™.Transform to Accelerate AI-Native Transformation for the Enterprise
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM) today announced the launch of AI/Run™.Transform Playbook — the next-generation of integrated consulting services built with AI to boost enterprise-wide AI-native transformation. The ROI-driven Playbook leverages EPAM's industry expertise and engineering excellence to help companies accelerate their journey toward becoming AI-native enterprises, positioning them to adapt and excel in ever-changing market dynamics.

headline: EPAM Systems’ Q3 2025 Earnings: What to Expect
summary: IT major EPAM Systems is set to unveil its third-quarter results by early November, and analysts expect a notable double-digit decline in earnings.

headline: 3 Out-of-Favor Stocks with Warning Signs
summary: Hitting a new 52-week low can be a pivotal moment for any stock. These floors often mark either the beginning of a turnaround story or confirmation that a company faces serious headwinds.
